snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio said the new Tenant Harassment Prevention Task Force, a multiagency effort aimed at weeding out and punishing bad landlords, was a “game-changer.”
abstract: New York City and state officials announce creation Tenant Harassment Prevention Task Force, designed to investigate complaints of tenant harassment and negligence by landlords and punish guilty parties; creation of unified task force comes in response to rising tenant harassment complaints.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio said the new Tenant Harassment Prevention Task Force, a multiagency effort aimed at weeding out and punishing bad landlords, was a “game-changer.”

headline.main: New York City and State Officials Joining Forces to Combat Tenant Harassment
headline.print_headline: Task Force to Combat Tenant Harassment
